channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- Exchange Reporter Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- Exchange Reporter Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-6204|2024-08-30T17:10:07.783Z -- manageengine -- exchange%20reporter%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Exchange Reporter Plus versions before 5715 are vulnerable to SQL Injection in the reports module.

item.title: CVE-2024-38872|2024-08-02T04:19:20.244Z -- manageengine -- exchange%20reporter%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine Exchange Reporter Plus versions 5717 and below are vulnerable to the authenticated SQL injection in the monitoring module.
